definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: shatter (NH id., dash, beat; As. napâṣu, shatter, destroy Dl:HWB 475; Targum [[נְפַע]] Pa. shatter, but also [[נְפַץ]] Pa., id., Syr. npas. shake, break, so Mand., Nö:M. 240, and ZMG xxxii (1878), 406);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Inf. abs. [[וְנׇפוֹץ]] c. acc. Ju Jdg 7:19 and a shattering (= and shattered) the jars; Pt. pass. [[עֶחֶב]] [[נִבְזֶה נׇפוּץ]] Je 22:28 (fig.) a vessel to be despised (and) shattered (cf. Ew Gie Rothstein:Kau); also Pt. act. [[נׁפֵץ]] shatterer of the holy people Da 12:7 (Bev Marti:Kau, rdg. [[כִּכְלוֹת יַד נׁפֵץ]]).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: dash to pieces: Pf. 3 ms. [[וְנִפֵּץ]] consec. Ps 137:9 c. acc. infants ag. ([[אֶל]]) rock; 1 S. [[וְנִפַּחְתִּ֫י]] of ´[[י]] dashing all in pieces with ([[ב]]) Babyl. as war-club Je 51:20, Je 51:21, Je 51:21, Je 51:22, Je 51:22, Je 51:22, Je 51:23, Je 51:23, Je 51:23, sf. [[וְנִפַּחְתִּים אִישׁ]] [[אֶל־אָחִיו]] Je 13:14; Impf. 2 ms. sf. [[כִּכְלִי יוֹחֵר תְּנַפְּחֵם]] Ps 2:9 (i.e. nations); 3 mpl. [[נִבְלֵיהֶם יְנַפֵָּחוּ]] Je 48:12 (symbol. of destroying Moab); Inf. [[נַפֵּץ יַד־עַם־קׂדֶשׁ]] Da 12:7 when (they) finish shattering the hand (fig. for power) of the holy people, but rd. poss. [[נׁפֵץ]], v.

definitions.title: Qal. Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. fpl. [[מְנֻפָּחוֹת]] Is 27:9 like chalk-stones pulverized.
